pattern.name: Trail Menu
pattern.author: Martijn van Welie
pattern.problem: User need to find information in a hierarchical structure.
pattern.context: The site has a shallow structure, typically up to 5 or 6 levels, while the number of items on each level are numerous.
pattern.pattlet: Show the traversed path in the menu
pattern.solution: This leads to a kind of but then integrated with the menu itself. The path can be shown horizontal or vertical. Each item of the path is a link type="" that takes users back to that level.
pattern.rationale: This type of navigation is a mix between a breadcrumb and menus. It consumes very little space and allows for the display of many items on a particular level.
